statements.select: select tb_gxfjxx_ID, tb_gxfjxx_mc, tb_gxfjxx_gxbs, tb_gxfjxx_lx, tb_gxfjxx_vamin, tb_gxfjxx_vamax, tb_gxfjxx_vadef, tb_gxfjxx_dxz, tb_gxfjxx_isbx from tb_gxfjxx where tb_gxfjxx_ID = $value$
select tb_gxfjxx_ID, tb_gxfjxx_mc, tb_gxfjxx_gxbs, tb_gxfjxx_lx, tb_gxfjxx_vamin, tb_gxfjxx_vamax, tb_gxfjxx_vadef, tb_gxfjxx_dxz, tb_gxfjxx_isbx from tb_gxfjxx

select tb_gxfjxx_ID, tb_gxfjxx_mc, tb_gxfjxx_gxbs, tb_gxfjxx_lx, tb_gxfjxx_vamin, tb_gxfjxx_vamax, tb_gxfjxx_vadef, tb_gxfjxx_dxz, tb_gxfjxx_isbx from tb_gxfjxx
tb_gxfjxx_gxbs = #tb_gxfjxx_gxbs#
statements.insert: insert into tb_gxfjxx ( tb_gxfjxx_mc, tb_gxfjxx_gxbs, tb_gxfjxx_lx, tb_gxfjxx_vamin, tb_gxfjxx_vamax, tb_gxfjxx_vadef, tb_gxfjxx_dxz, tb_gxfjxx_isbx ) values ( #tb_gxfjxx_mc#, #tb_gxfjxx_gxbs#, #tb_gxfjxx_lx#, #tb_gxfjxx_vamin#, #tb_gxfjxx_vamax#, #tb_gxfjxx_vadef#, #tb_gxfjxx_dxz#, #tb_gxfjxx_isbx# )
statements.update:
update tb_gxfjxx set
tb_gxfjxx_mc = #tb_gxfjxx_mc#,
tb_gxfjxx_gxbs = #tb_gxfjxx_gxbs#,
tb_gxfjxx_lx = #tb_gxfjxx_lx#,
tb_gxfjxx_vamin = #tb_gxfjxx_vamin#,
tb_gxfjxx_vamax = #tb_gxfjxx_vamax#,
tb_gxfjxx_vadef = #tb_gxfjxx_vadef#,
tb_gxfjxx_dxz = #tb_gxfjxx_dxz#,
tb_gxfjxx_isbx = #tb_gxfjxx_isbx#,
where tb_gxfjxx_ID = $tb_gxfjxx_ID$
